sentences.english: The eldest Kasyapa's disciples were in rags and practiced a Dhuta practice.
sentences.chinese: 大伽葉的弟子衣衫襤褸，他們修的是頭陀行。

sentences.english: Toutuoxing was one of the most common means of practicing Buddhism in the early Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 頭陀行是早期佛教最常見的一種修持方式。

sentences.english: I am the foremost in ascetic virtues.
The Buddhist poems of BaZhiTouTuo reached the peak in the modern times .
sentences.chinese: 中國近代的禪詩至八指頭陀而達於頂峯。
